name: Paid API No Payment Terms
description: This manifest has a v0.3 payment block but agent_notes does not mention payment, onboarding, or budget. Should pass validation but yield a warning for operational completeness.

authentication.instructions: Get key from dashboard. Use X-API-Key header.

agent_notes: This API requires an account. Authentication is via API key in the X-API-Key header. Pricing and cost information: $0.01 per request. Free tier not available. Contact support for more details. This has account, auth, and pricing . Terms and conditions apply. Must be 150 chars for v0.3.
